articles.author: ET HealthWorld
articles.title: Study shows gut microbiome may predict colorectal cancer risk - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: Gut bacteria may be linked with the onset of colorectal lesions and cancers, finds a study. The findings, presented at the United European Gastroenterology (UEG) Week 2023 held in Denmark, opens promising new avenues for enhancing the detection and prevention…
articles.content: The research led by a team at University Medical Center Groningen in the Netherlands identified significant variations in the gut microbiome of individuals who developed precancerous colonic lesions.… [+2249 chars]
